name: Nuvoid
storyline: Even with the extinction of the human race over 200 years ago, war rages on in the universe like nothing has changed. Long-abandoned factories remain operational, constructing fighter drones to continue the never ending war effort. Take control over a hacked drone, and immerse yourself in the chaotic, war-torn universe.
summary:
Nuvoid is a free roam procedurally generated space game where you have the ability to design your spacecrafts however you like, including the controls!

Although still in development, Nuvoid will be story driven having the choice to complete missions and do quests, but at the same time nothing is stopping you from flying off into any direction to explore huge asteroids, discover long-abandoned space stations, fight other drones, and upgrade your ship!

Try out the demo at: https://targonstudios.itch.io/nuvoid

Also don't forget to vote for it on Steam Greenlight: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=798288999
